original: intros s A. split. - intros H. destruct H as [A' [H1 H2]]. apply in_rev in H1. apply gamma in H1. apply in_map_iff in H1. destruct H1 as [[x y] [H3 H4]]. simpl in H4. rewrite H4 in H2. apply in_app_iff. left. apply H2. - intros H. apply in_rev. apply gamma. apply in_map_iff. exists (s, rev (tau2 (gamma A))). split. + apply H. + simpl. rewrite rev_app_distr. reflexivity.
